Scene Info Pane sample

Description :

This plug-in is a very simple example of extending the DAZ Studio interface by inheriting from the DzPane class. Plug-ins that need a persistent interface where the user is still able to interact with the rest of the DAZ Studio interface should implement their interface as a DzPane subclass.

In this example, we provide a simple HTML-based display of general information about the scene contents and the current selection. This pane also updates itself whenever the scene or primary selection is changed so that the display reflects the contents of the scene in 'real time'.

 
Concepts Covered :
  • Addition of a new interface tab/pane by inheriting DzPane
  • Addition of an action to activate the pane by inheriting DzPaneAction
  • Using the Slots/Signals architecture to get notification of changes to the Scene.
  • Accessing and iterating over the items in the Scene.
  • Suggested coding standards and project layout
 
Files : ./sdk/samples/interface/DzSceneInfo
